nodes.description: 俄克拉荷马城联邦大楼发生爆炸，造成168人死亡。
nodes.support_text: ...dedicated to those who died in the bombing of the Murrah Federal Building six years ago.

nodes.description: 一些人返回坍塌的建筑中救人并因此牺牲。
nodes.support_text: The man who survived the blast but instead of escaping the crumbling building went straight to what was left of the second-floor day care center, where the babies and children were, and died when he was struck by falling debris. The nurse who was killed the same way after running into the ruins …

nodes.description: 蒂莫西·麦克维接受了审判并被定罪。
nodes.support_text: ...the anniversaries of the bombing, McVeigh's trial and conviction...

nodes.description: 一座为纪念遇难者而建的纪念碑在爆炸案后完工。
nodes.support_text: ...the completion of a spectacular $29-million memorial dedicated to those who died in the bombing of the Murrah Federal Building six years ago.

nodes.description: 麦克维的处决经历了筹备和延迟的过程。
nodes.support_text: ...the build-up to his execution and the delay...

nodes.description: 蒂莫西·麦克维被处以死刑。
nodes.support_text: When Timothy McVeigh is put to death Monday, Florence Rogers won't be watching.

nodes.description: Florence Rogers 发表了她的看法和假设。
nodes.support_text: "I'm not gonna waste my time on that skinny little bastard," "If I want to see an execution, I'll go out and rent `The Green Mile.'"

nodes.description: Florence Rogers 将不会观看处决过程。
nodes.support_text: When Timothy McVeigh is put to death Monday, Florence Rogers won't be watching.

nodes.description: Florence Rogers 表示她不会浪费自己的时间。
nodes.support_text: "I'm not gonna waste my time on that skinny little bastard,"

nodes.description: Florence Rogers 提出了一个假设性的愿望。
nodes.support_text: "If I want to see an execution..."

nodes.description: Florence Rogers 说她会外出。
nodes.support_text: "...I'll go out and rent `The Green Mile.'"

nodes.description: Florence Rogers 说她会去租借电影《绿里奇迹》。
nodes.support_text: "...I'll go out and rent `The Green Mile.'"

nodes.description: 对Treanor来说，这件事的本质是直面邪恶并成为最后的幸存者。
nodes.support_text: it boiled down to staring evil straight in the face, and being the last one standing.

nodes.description: Treanor直面邪恶。
nodes.support_text: staring evil straight in the face

nodes.description: Treanor对邪恶宣告‘你输了’。
nodes.support_text: saying, 'You lose.' to the evil

nodes.description: 邪恶最终失败。
nodes.support_text: You lose.

nodes.description: 大部分国民将从远处观看McVeigh的处决。
